Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against Gram- E. cloacae ATCC 13047 (MIC 25 uM), S. sonnei (ATCC 29930) (MIC 5 uM), Psychrobacter sp. (PAMC 25501) (MIC 2.5 uM), E. coli DH5alpha (MIC 5 uM), Gram+ E. faecalis (ATCC 29212) (MIC 25 uM), S. pyogenes (ATCC 19615) (MIC 2.5 uM), S. aureus (ATCC 33591), L. monocytogenes (ATCC 15313) (MIC 5 uM), and yeast C. tropicalis (ATCC 20115) (MIC 5 uM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Characterization of Two Antimicrobial Peptides from Antarctic Fishes (Notothenia coriiceps and Parachaenichthys charcoti)
Literature.Author: Shin SC, Ahn IH, Ahn DH, Lee YM, Lee J, Lee JH, Kim HW, Park H
